title: Is Lissandra considered strong right now?
body:
Or did I finally git (somewhat) gud with her?  I always liked to play her because in silver I'm usually the only one willing to pick a champ with cc, but I had an atrocious winrate and performance with the champ. I think I'm actually above a 50% winrate now.

Just wondering if im being carried by an overtuned champ, or if I actually have her mechanics down.
